trans: After explaining the question, is worried that doing this will be labeled wrongly? Is it misgendering? It might make people in the community üè≥Ô∏èüåà who are not in the fan club have questions (because there's often movement in the community that artists BL/GL use identities in working but are not really aware of it.) It is understood that people might take it seriously differently. This side is used to serious awareness. If you don't say that you are a woman, but you label her with female, especially in formal ways (words like mom, mermaid, etc. used for fun and not considered an official announcement), could this cause use a problem? But many people may not be serious about it.
